title: Where is my Silver Border?
body: I was Silver 5 at the end of season 7. Were Silver borders already rewarded? I didn't get mine. Send help.

replies.body:
It looks like your account disqualified itself from ranked reward due having had a 2 week suspension on your account after 8/22, per the [**ranked rewards guidelines**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068). 

> Players issued a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this yearâ€™s rewards. Bans that started before 8/22/2017 will not disqualify a player, even if the ban period extended past that date.
